reqsimile.simcalc
Class Cosine

java.lang.Object
  reqsimile.simcalc.Cosine
public class Cosine
extends java.lang.Object

Cosine contains helper methods to calculate the Cosine angle between two requirements in the word space.

In the current implementation, the Cosine is calculated in a two-step process:

  • Preprocessing where weights and square sums calculated
  • SQL statement in which the final calculation is made
This class contains only helper functions. For further information on how the measure is calculated see PreProcessRs and FetchSimilar.

Since:
1.4.2
Author:
Johan Natt och Dag
